hot_kitchen.name: Food Service from the Hot Kitchen until 2pm

items.name: The Station Egg Sandwich
items.description: Herbed farmers cheese, pickled red onion, folded egg, arugula on ciabatta.
items.options: Add bacon, pork sausage, chicken sausage, or vegan sausage +3

items.name: Potato Bowl
items.description: Chopped bacon, roasted jalapeno, green onion, cheddar cheese, ancho aioli, sunnyside egg, pickled red onion.

items.name: Smoked Salmon Bagel
items.description: Herbed farmers cheese, smoked salmon, shaved red onion, capers.

items.name: Veggie Sammie (V)
items.description: Cucumber, heirloom tomato, and alfalfa sprouts with red pepper pesto, pickled red onions on sourdough bread with vegan mayo.

items.name: Smash Burger
items.description: Local ground beef blend, american cheese, burger sauce, shaved red onion, bibb lettuce.

items.name: Grilled Chicken Melt
items.description: Grilled chicken, red pepper pesto, gruyere cheese, pickled reds, heirloom tomato, arugula on multi-grain bread.

items.name: Signature Salad
items.description: Seasonal greens, cucumber, cherry tomato, shaved red onion, asparagus, chickpeas, goat cheese, herb toasted almonds and citrus-herb vinaigrette.

items.name: Cucumber Salad
items.description: Cucumber, red onion, asparagus, cherry tomato with a dill vinegar dressing.

items.name: Overnight Oats (V)
items.description: Rolled oats soaked in oat milk, maple syrup and cinnamon. Topped with toasted almonds, blueberries, strawberry, almond butter and preserves.

items.name: Yogurt Parfait
items.description: Ronnybrook vanilla yogurt, fresh berries, granola, house fruit preserves.

items.name: Turkey Club
items.description: Herb-roasted turkey breast, gruyere cheese, heirloom tomato, bibb lettuce, bacon aioli on white bread.

items.name: Toasted Bagel
items.description: Your choice of: cream cheese, farmers cheese, or butter.

disclaimer: Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions.
